en:
C.L.A.R.A Coaching organizes a life coaching workshop, in a beautiful natural setting on the banks of the Belon river. It's aimed at a group of women (group size limited to 6) wishing to get to know themselves better, discover new personal development tools, and share their experience with others.

The workshop is punctuated by a moment of conviviality over a picnic ("auberge espagnole").
Goodwill and sharing are the order of the day.

 ? The theme for June 25, 2023: Discover your talents and resources. What is a talent? Does everyone have at least one talent? How can we identify not only our talents, but also our resources?

? Enrolment is based on a telephone conversation, to ensure that the workshop meets your expectations. You will be sent the workshop rules and regulations.

? Please do not hesitate to contact us if you are interested.

? Other themes include - the values that drive us, - the beliefs that govern us and sometimes limit us. - How to turn your dream into a goal?

We look forward to meeting you!
